product_name: Nathan QuickDraw Plus Handheld Water Bottle
long_description: The Nathan Quickdraw Plus handheld water bottle carrier keeps your essentials and hydration right at your fingertips. Low-profile zippered pocket with key clip is sized to hold your smartphone and a couple other small essentials, such as a gym card and cash. Quickdraw Plus includes a 22 fl. oz. bottle with sport top. Moisture-wicking air-mesh hand strap allows air to circulate around hand; strap adjusts to fit any hand size. BPA-free bottle is dishwasher safe (top rack).
short_description: The Nathan Quickdraw Plus handheld water bottle carrier keeps your essentials and hydration right at your fingertips.
